abstract: United Nations says it will establish panel to investigate killing of Spanish peacekeeper during fight between Hezbollah militants and Israeli soldiers near Israel-Lebanon border.
lead_paragraph: A panel will determine who is responsible for the death of a Spanish peacekeeper in a clash between Israeli soldiers and Hezbollah fighters last week.

headline.main: U.N. to Appoint Panel to Investigate Peacekeeper’s Death on Israel-Lebanon Border
headline.print_headline: Panel to Look Into Peacekeeper’s Killing

snippet: A panel will determine who is responsible for the death of a Spanish peacekeeper in a clash between Israeli soldiers and Hezbollah fighters last week.

keywords.value: United Nations Department of Peacekeeping Operations
